system.name: True Steel
system.effect:
Trigger - Your Steel-Type Pokémon is hit by a damaging attack
Effect: Your Pokémon gains Damage Reduction against the attack equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank. Additionally, calculate Type Effectiveness with this attack as if your Pokémon has no Typings besides Steel.
system.prerequisites: Polished Shine, Type-Linked Skill at Master
